Title: Information - Peggy Storey
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0pre3 Date: Tuesday, 26-Nov-96 16:31:41 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 912 Last-Modified: Friday, 15-Nov-96 19:54:34 GMT Information - Peggy Storey Peggy Storey Peggy Storey is a joint PhD student with the School of Computing Science at Simon Fraser University and the Department of Computer Science at the University of Victoria .
